name: MisReverse
description:
Misreverse is a game where Mi, an investigative agent explores a strange world where she meets someone with her face but from a different world. Can she trust this person? It seems she needs to use her abilities to get out of here!

Swap stats between realms, Having strong Strength in the normal world will cause the reverse Mi's Intelligience to be high!

This was game submitted for the 2023 Dungeon Crawler Game Jam.

WASD / Arrow Keys and most controllers should work for movement.

Enter is the confirm key on keyboard and escape will bring up the menu

There is no options menu it's lying.

Music used from Dova-sounds

https://dova-s.jp/EN/
